Text: RTAFYI Companies J B have significant RTA permanent flowthrus Just a heads up for the meeting todayI would be prepared to provide a more detailed explanation regarding the late entries made Robbie

RTA Meeting EB After a brief discussion with Greek regarding our consolidated returntoaccrual impact he has suggested that Sr Specialists and above that were involved in either the yearend accrual or the return review process meet with him tomorrow to discuss our respective RTA adjustments Michelle Thompson and I will be preparing a summary schedule tonight of the material issues that we believe Greek may address tomorrow Please refer to the original schedule that Michelle sent and be prepared to discuss any RTA adjustments that could your PL In the interim please call if you have any questions Thanks Robbie
